pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface Between GRASS Geographical Information System and R // Interpreted interface between 'GRASS' geographical information system and R, based on starting R from within the 'GRASS' 'GIS' environment, or running free-standing R in a temporary 'GRASS' location; the package provides facilities for using all 'GRASS' commands from the R command line. This package may not be used for 'GRASS' 6, for which 'spgrass6' should be used.
